articles.content: Middlesbrough's Easter weekend games against Bournemouth and Huddersfield have both been selected for Sky coverage. The Bournemouth game will still kick-off at 3pm but the visit of the Terriers has b… [+802 chars]

articles.title: Worcester statement: Willi Heinz has left with immediate effect - RugbyPass
articles.description: Ex-England scrum-half Willi Heinz has been released from his contract with Worcester by mutual agreement to return to his native New Zealand.
articles.content: Former England scrum-half Willi Heinz has been released from his contract with Worcester by mutual agreement to return to his native New Zealand. The 35-year-old joined Warriors from Gloucester last … [+1793 chars]

articles.title: Gethin Jones in action for Bolton Wanderers' reserves but Lloyd Isgrove suffers injury setback - The Bolton News
articles.description: GETHIN Jones returned to action as Wanderers’ reserve side drew 1-1 with Fleetwood at the Eddie Davies Academy.
articles.content:
GETHIN Jones returned to action as Wanderers reserve side drew 1-1 with Fleetwood at the Eddie Davies Academy.

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Kamila Valieva set to return to skating competition in Russian-only event - The Guardian
articles.description: The 15-year-old will return to competition in Saransk this weekend with no apparent conclusion in sight to the doping case that blighted the Beijing Games
articles.content: Thirty-seven days after her dramatic fall from grace at the Winter Olympics, Kamila Valieva will return to competition in Saransk, Russia this weekend with no apparent conclusion in sight to the dopi… [+3451 chars]
